mapper.select: WITH TB_CAL AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(FIRST_DAY + LEVEL - 1, 'D') DAYS , TO_CHAR(FIRST_DAY + LEVEL - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') BASE_YMD , SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(FIRST_DAY + LEVEL - 1, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4) AS BASE_Y , SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(FIRST_DAY + LEVEL - 1, 'YYYYMMDD'), 5, 2) AS BASE_MM , SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(FIRST_DAY + LEVEL - 1, 'YYYYMMDD'), 7, 2) AS BASE_D FROM (SELECT TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{baseYm} || '01', 'YYYYMMDD') , 'MM') - (TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{baseYm} || '01', 'YYYYMMDD'), 'D')) - 1) FIRST_DAY FROM DUAL) WHERE 1=1 CONNECT BY FIRST_DAY + LEVEL - 1 <= TRUNC(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{baseYm} || '01', 'YYYYMMDD'))) + (7 - (TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{baseYm} || '01', 'YYYYMMDD')), 'D')))) ) SELECT TB_1.BASE_Y AS BASE_Y /* 기준년도 */ , TB_1.BASE_MM AS BASE_MM /* 기준월 */ , TB_1.BASE_D AS BASE_D /* 기준일 */ , TB_2.DOW_DV_CD AS DOW_DV_CD /* 요일구분코드 */ , TB_2.DF_YN AS DF_YN /* 휴무여부 */ , TB_2.PHLD_YN AS PHLD_YN /* 공휴일여부 */ , TB_2.RMK_CN AS RMK_CN /* 비고내용 */ , TB_2.WRK_STRT_HH AS WRK_STRT_HH /* 근무시작시간 */ , TB_2.WRK_END_HH AS WRK_END_HH /* 근무종료시간 */ , TB_2.REST_HH AS REST_HH /* 휴식시간 */ , TB_2.WRK_HH AS WRK_HH /* 근무시간 */ , TB_3.BNDT_WRK_PSIC_NO AS BNDT_WRK_PSIC_NO /* 당직근무담당자번호 */ , ( SELECT TEMP.PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ TEMP WHERE 1=1 AND TEMP.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} AND TEMP.OG_TP_CD IN ('W03', 'W06') AND TEMP.PRTNR_NO = TB_3.BNDT_WRK_PSIC_NO AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS BNDT_WRK_PSIC_NM , #{serviceCenterCd} AS SV_CNR_OG_CD /* 서비스센터조직CD */ , #{serviceCenterOgId} AS SV_CNR_OG_ID /* 서비스센터조직ID */ FROM TB_CAL TB_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_SV_CLND_BAS TB_2 ON ( TB_1.BASE_Y = TB_2.BASE_Y AND TB_1.BASE_MM = TB_2.BASE_MM AND TB_1.BASE_D = TB_2.BASE_D ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_BNDT_WRK_PSIC_RGST_IZ TB_3 ON ( TB_1.BASE_Y = TB_3.BASE_Y AND TB_1.BASE_MM = TB_3.BASE_MM AND TB_1.BASE_D = TB_3.BASE_D AND #{serviceCenterOgId} = TB_3.SV_CNR_OG_ID ) WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY TB_1.BASE_Y , TB_1.BASE_MM , TB_1.BASE_D

SELECT TB_1.BASE_Y , TB_1.BASE_MM , TB_1.BASE_D , TB_1.DF_YN , TB_1.RMK_CN , #{svCnrOgId} AS SV_CNR_OG_ID , TB_2.BNDT_WRK_PSIC_NO FROM TB_SVPD_SV_CLND_BAS TB_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_BNDT_WRK_PSIC_RGST_IZ TB_2 ON ( TB_1.BASE_Y = TB_2.BASE_Y AND TB_1.BASE_MM = TB_2.BASE_MM AND TB_1.BASE_D = TB_2.BASE_D AND #{svCnrOgId} = TB_2.SV_CNR_OG_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND TB_1.BASE_Y = #{baseY} AND TB_1.BASE_MM = #{baseMm} AND TB_1.BASE_D = #{baseD}
